name: Don't count to 30 !
description:
This is my very first video game ! I've started to code just 3 weeks ago and i've got the idea to do a mini-game based on a french TV Show called "Fort-Boyard", especially one of the trial .

But if you had played Shin Megami Tensei License, you could have played that game in Strange Journey Redux :) .

The game has been made in Lua with Löve2D. Only available in french. Graphics made by me.

The OST of the game is "8-bit March" made by Twin musicom.

Thank your very much for playing that game !
